trans-unit.source: The base class for discoverable references using XML Web services discovery.
trans-unit.target: A classe base para referências detectáveis usando a descoberta de serviços Web XML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> all inherit from <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference>, and represent the three types of documents discoverable through XML Web services discovery: Service Descriptions, XML Schema Definition (XSD) schemas, and discovery documents, respectively.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.ContractReference>, <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference>, e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryDocumentReference> todas herdam <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference>e representam os três tipos de documentos podem ser descobertos por meio da descoberta de serviços Web XML: descrições de serviços, esquemas de definição de esquema XML (XSD) e documentos de descoberta respectivamente.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> used in a discovery process.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> usado em um processo de descoberta.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> used in a discovery process
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol" /> usado em um processo de descoberta

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the default file to use when saving the referenced discovery document, XSD schema, or Service Description.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do arquivo padrão a ser usado ao salvar o documento de descoberta referenciado, o esquema XSD ou a descrição do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Name of the default file to use when saving the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Nome do arquivo padrão a ser usado ao salvar o documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: The URL on which the name of the file is based.
trans-unit.target: A URL na qual o nome do arquivo se baseia.

trans-unit.source: Returns a file name based on the passed URL.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um nome de arquivo com base na URL passada.

trans-unit.source: Name of the file based on the passed URL.
trans-unit.target: Nome do arquivo com base na URL passada.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the reference document.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> contendo o documento de referência.

trans-unit.source: Reads the passed <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and returns an instance of the class representing the type of referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Lê o <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> passado e retorna uma instância da classe que representa o tipo de documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> with an underlying type matching the type of referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Object" /> com um tipo subjacente que corresponda ao tipo de documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: The return value is always an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: O valor de retorno é sempre um <xref:System.Object>.

trans-unit.source: However, the underlying type varies, depending on the type of document referenced.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o tipo subjacente varia, dependendo do tipo de documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: For instance, a <xref:System.IO.Stream> passed into <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> returns an instance of <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.IO.Stream> passado para <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.SchemaReference.ReadDocument%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> retorna uma instância de <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>.

trans-unit.source: Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.
trans-unit.target: Resolve se o documento referenciado é válido.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the referenced document at <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url" /> to resolve whether the referenced document is valid.
trans-unit.target: Baixa o documento referenciado em <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Url" /> para resolver se o documento referenciado é válido.

trans-unit.source: Downloads the referenced document and then invokes the overloaded <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Resolve%2A> member that takes a MIME type and a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: Baixa o documento referenciado e, em seguida, invoca o sobrecarregado <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.Resolve%2A> membro que utiliza um tipo MIME e um <xref:System.IO.Stream>.

trans-unit.source: If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo MIME e o conteúdo de `stream` coincide esperado o tipo de referência, em seguida, o conteúdo de `stream` são adicionados ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedades de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> property is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The MIME type of <c>stream</c>.
trans-unit.target: O tipo MIME de <c>fluxo</c>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> containing the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> que contém o documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: Resolves whether the referenced document is valid.
trans-unit.target: Resolve se o documento referenciado é válido.

trans-unit.source: If the MIME type and the contents of `stream` match those expected by the reference type, then the contents of `stream` are added to the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> properties of <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se o tipo MIME e o conteúdo de `stream` coincide esperado o tipo de referência, em seguida, o conteúdo de `stream` são adicionados ao <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.References%2A> e <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.Documents%2A> propriedades de <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryReference.ClientProtocol%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL of the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a URL do documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: The URL of the referenced document.
trans-unit.target: A URL do documento referenciado.

trans-unit.source: The document to write into a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: O documento a ser gravado em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> into which the <c>document</c> is written.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> no qual o <c>documento</c> é gravado.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes the document to a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, grava o documento em um <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.

trans-unit.source: DiscoveryReference#1
trans-unit.target: DiscoveryReference#1
